page.title: 10IMPERIAL HOTEL, EXMOUTH
page.content: I think that the hotel looks good because of its white walls, lovely garden, swimming pool and 2 tennis courts. The Imperial hotel has 58 rooms, some single, some double and some family. It was built in (1865) and most of it was rebuilt in (1972) when a fire broke out. Added attractions are a sauna, solarium, 18 hole putting green, childrens adventure park and a croquet lawn. There is provision for the disabled. Mr Rogers the manager said that he did like his job. He looks after his customers,checks that the hotel is clean and tidy. There are 20-30 staff in the winter and 40-50 in the summer. Mr Rogers works 12-15 hours a day in the summer. It is busiest from Easter until October.
